SELECT CASE WHEN YEARWEEK(pay_date, 1) = YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01'), 1) THEN '1주차' WHEN YEARWEEK(pay_date, 1) = YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01'), 1) + 1 THEN '2주차' WHEN YEARWEEK(pay_date, 1) = YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01'), 1) + 2 THEN '3주차' WHEN YEARWEEK(pay_date, 1) = YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01'), 1) + 3 THEN '4주차' WHEN YEARWEEK(pay_date, 1) = YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01'), 1) + 4 THEN '5주차' END AS week_label, SUM(pay_money) AS pay_money FROM payment WHERE pay_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND pay_date < DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() + INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m-01') AND accounts_key = (SELECT member_key FROM member WHERE id = #{id}) GROUP BY week_label ORDER BY MIN(pay_date)
